column3: The flexible version of Moleskine notebooks, in color. This Underwater Blue version of the Soft Cover pocket notebook is flexible and sturdy, making it the perfect travel companion. Use the dotted page layout according to your needs: it will guide you to create the page you prefer or to insert designs, charts, and anything else. Thread bound with a soft cover with rounded corners, acid-free paper, bookmark ribbon, elastic closure and an expandable inner pocket that contains the Moleskine history inside.
